title: Personnel
context: PART VI. GENERAL ADMINISTRATION Note Part redesignated by L 1976, c 152, §2. §323D-61 Personnel. The administrator of the state agency shall hire necessary personnel under chapter 76 to carry out the purposes of this chapter. [L 1975, c 159, pt of §2; ree L 1977, c 178, pt of §2; am L 2000, c 253, §150]
